name: Reverse Geocoding and Geolocation Service
title: Reverse Geocoding and Geolocation Service
description: Find nearest or largest city information or timezone for any given point location (latitude/longitude). The reverse geocode API back "reverse" codes any GPS location point into nearest or largest readable places with county, city, distance and population.

endpoints.name: GetTimezone
endpoints.description: Finds the local timezone for any given geo-location point by lat and long and returns timezone information with Timezone name, Timezone id and current local time.

endpoints.name: GetLargestCities
endpoints.description: Returns 5 largest cities within a given radial range with name, population, country and distance.

endpoints.name: GetNearestCities
endpoints.description: Returns a readable place name as nearest 3 cities with population, country and distance based on given latitude/longitude pair.
